{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6424n |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/11/2008 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM,unknown |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9564240809 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880 |cpu1_cspeed=266 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A2V64S40CTP |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=263&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=18 Product page]
RAM and Flash part numbers from [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=89008 this DD-WRT forums thread]. The third receive chain is omitted.
The FCC test report lists the following items as identical.. *Edimax BR-6424nL / GR-424nL / BR-6424n *Logitec LAN-WN22/R
The default SSID may be '''default'''.
